official-title.#text: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish a grant program to assist the repair and replacement of bridges, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013

short-title.#text: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Bridge repair and replacement grant program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is authorized to make a grant, on a competitive basis, to a State to assist a project to repair or replace a bridge.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall give preference to a proposed project that, as determined by the

text.#text: addresses a bridge with a demonstrated significant need for repair or replacement; and
creates a significant number of jobs.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , a State shall submit to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: an application in such form, at such time, and containing such information as the

text.#text: To be eligible for a grant under
an identification of the bridge to be repaired or replaced;
a description of the activities to be undertaken with grant funds;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013/s:2/ss:c/p:2

text.#text: an analysis of the need for the activities described in
an analysis of the number of jobs to be created as a result of the grant.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Building and Repairing Infrastructure with Domestic Gains in Employment Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: The Federal share of the cost of a project assisted with a grant made under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: There is authorized to be appropriated
